alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:18AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Prowers County through 145 AM MDT... At 118 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holly, or near Coolidge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
